news_header: Singer Liam Payne has died at 31, and Dame Maggie Smith has also passed away at 89. The BBC reflects on their careers and other notable events in entertainment.
news_text: Liam Payne, the former One Direction singer, has died at the age of 31 in Argentina, prompting a retrospective on his career by the BBC. Dame Maggie Smith, known for her roles in Harry Potter and Downton Abbey, has also passed away at 89. The text mentions various entertainment events, including a controversial British TV show winning major awards, and highlights appearances by stars like Katy Perry and Taylor Swift. Additionally, it covers topics such as police investigations, upcoming film promotions, and the impact of recent controversies in the entertainment industry.
